Traits.Name: Receive Orders
Traits.Description: When this unit starts its turn in range of a command aura, it recharges all its abilities.

Actions.Name: Pistol
Actions.Description: The powder mage fires a pistol at a character in range 5, dealing piercing fray damage as an effect.

Actions.Name: Pistol Flurry
Actions.Description: The powder mage uses Pistol on all visible hostile characters in range 5.
